messages.tl: Sixth level (post)
This woman... what happened...
Sure enough, you are not the chief conductor.

messages.zh: 制压切城军事据点的整合运动像机器一样高效——
messages.tl: The Reunion Movement, which is a military base for the suppression of the city, is as efficient as a machine.

messages.zh: 而你领着的这批各个都像神经错乱的暴徒。
messages.tl: And the groups you lead are all like nervous chaos.

messages.zh: 屠杀，纵火，围猎......只不过是满足你自己残忍的趣味而已吧？
messages.tl: Slaughter, arson, hunting... just to satisfy your own cruel taste?

messages.zh: 会在这时煽动如此不堪之事的人，没可能策划出足够击溃整座城市的方案。
messages.tl: Those who will incite such unbearable things at this time are unlikely to plan enough to defeat the entire city.

messages.zh: 你的指挥官大概是命令你制造混乱吧？
messages.tl: Your commander probably ordered you to create chaos?

messages.zh: 而你，就依着自己低劣的品味肆意妄为。
messages.tl: And you, according to your own inferior taste and deliberate.

messages.zh: ——这样幼稚狂妄的人，也就是个小头目而已。
messages.tl: - This kind of childish and arrogant person is just a small leader.
- Faust.
Give me her mouth and pierce it.
Cough, cough...
Untrained guy!
blocked? With shields -? !

messages.zh: 不可能......不可能！你在做什么！
messages.tl: Impossible... impossible! what are you doing!

messages.zh: 再来！！把这家伙打成碎渣！
messages.tl: Come again! ! Beat this guy into scum!
Hey -!
I can't think of it!
—————— I want to put you all, ——
Nearl, now!

messages.zh: 小队成员，随我冲击敌方阵形！阿米娅——
messages.tl: Team members, with me to attack the enemy formation! Amiya -

messages.zh: 明白，小心敌方狙击手！注意借助烟尘隐蔽！
messages.tl: Understand, beware of enemy snipers! Pay attention to the hidden dust!
Counterattack begins!
